channel.title: My server just won't work!
channel.description:
Hi, Kivrin here, and my server just won't work. I've done everything EXACTLY as you told me to (Taharok) and it just won't work! Here's EXACTLY what I did... 1. Downloaded Project 16V2 source. 2. Edited it to my liking :). 3. Created a No-Ip (kivscape.no-ip.org) and downloaded the DUC (and ran it...). 4. Opened my web browser, went to 1*2.168.1.* (MY IP) and logged into my network control panel. 5. Went into Port Fowarding, here is the screenie... [img]http://xs511.xs.to/xs511/07045/IPthingy.png[/img] 6. Did "compile.bat" and ran my server, tried to log on: Error connect.. blah blah blah.
Common questions:
[i]Do you have your firewall disabled?[/i] [b]YES!!!!![/b]
[i]Did you LEAVE compile.bat running on your server?[/i] [b]YES!!!!!!![/b]
[i]Is your No-Ip account set up correctly, corresponding with your Port Fowarding settings?[/i] [b]YES!!!!!!!!!![/b]
Any suggestions?

item.title: My server just won't work!
item.dc:creator: @Kivrin Kivrin
item.description:
@Kivrin wrote:

Hi, Kivrin here, and my server just won’t work. I’ve done everything EXACTLY as you told me to (Taharok) and it just won’t work! Here’s EXACTLY what I did…

  1. Downloaded Project 16V2 source.
  2. Edited it to my liking :).
  3. Created a No-Ip (kivscape.no-ip.org) and downloaded the DUC (and ran it…).
  4. Opened my web browser, went to 12.168.1. (MY IP) and logged into my network control panel.
  5. Went into Port Fowarding, here is the screenie…
  6. Did “compile.bat” and ran my server, tried to log on: Error connect… blah blah blah.

Common questions:

Do you have your firewall disabled?
YES!!!

Did you LEAVE compile.bat running on your server?
YES!!!

Is your No-Ip account set up correctly, corresponding with your Port Fowarding settings?
YES!!!

Any suggestions?

Read full topic
